channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Another Blow to Joe: Appeals Court Blocks Biden Student Loan Plan
Trump breaks out immigration chart shown right before assassination attempt: ‘Saved my life’
item.description: Former President Donald Trump showed off the chart that he was attempting to show during his rally in Pennsylvania that was cut short by an attempt on his life.

item.title: Trump: 'I Could Stop Wars' With 1 Call; 'We Want Our Hostages Back'
item.description: In typical Donald Trump fashion, the official Republican nominee went off script and told Americans he could stop wars with just a phone call and warned the Hamas terrorists to return all hostages or face his wrath.

item.title: HUGE RNC SALE: 60% Off VIP Membership - FINAL HOURS!
Five biggest moments of Trump’s speech to RNC
item.description: Former President Donald Trump made his speech to the Republican National Convention on Thursday, with a number of key moments throughout the address.

item.title: Trump Explains Brush With Death: 'I Will Never Stop Fighting for You'
item.description: After accepting the Republican nomination, Donald Trump paused the traditional acceptance speech to tell the harrowing brush with death as shot by a bullet from a would-be assassin

item.title: CNN's Van Jones Gets Real: 'The Last Time I Was at a Convention That Felt Like This Was Obama 2008'
'They're incompetent': Sen Marshall blasts 'worthless' Secret Service briefing on Trump assassination attempt
item.description: Sen. Roger Marshall, R-Kan., slammed a briefing senators received from Secret Service on Wednesday, claiming the information he was provided had already been reported on the news prior.

item.title: Black Women Rally Behind Biden
item.description: Black women are coalescing around President Joe Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris in a letter released Thursday indicating their support, reports The Hill.

item.title: WATCH: Trump Speaks in Detail About Assassination Attempt, Calls for National Unity
Trump preaches unity as he accepts GOP presidential nomination days after surviving assassination attempt
item.description: Former President Trump delivers his 2024 GOP nomination acceptance speech on the final night of the Republican National Convention.

item.title: Melania Trump Enters RNC in Rare Public Campaign Appearance
item.description: Former first lady Melania Trump made her only public appearance at the Republican National Convention Thursday, walking into Milwaukee's Fiserv Forum dressed in a red skirt suit, smiling and waving before walking up to join the Trump family in the box.

item.title: WATCH: The UFC's Dana White Electrifies the Crowd at the RNC, Says Trump Is the Toughest Guy He Knows
Trump pays emotional tribute to Corey Comperatore during RNC speech: 'Spirit that forged America'
item.description: Former President Donald Trump paid a moving tribute to Pennsylvania firefighter Corey Comperatore, who was killed by a would-be assassin at a Trump rally in the state.

item.title: Trump Team Runs Strategy Against Potential Biden Replacements
item.description: As former President Donald Trump is positioned to accept the Republican presidential nomination, his inner circle is running through a host of plays should President Joe Biden drop out of the race, reports Politico.
